title: Bruce Sterling - Mirrorshades
description:
Written by Bruce Sterling
Read by Gary Tells
Format: MP3
Bitrate: Variable

01) Preface by Bruce Sterling
02) The Gernsback Continuum by William Gibson
03) Snake-Eyes by Tom Maddox
04) Rock On by Pat Cadigan
05) Tales of Houdini by Rudy Rucker
06) 400 Boys by Marc Laidlaw
07) Solstice by James Patrick Kelly
08) Petra by Greg Bear
09) Till Human Voices Wake Us by Lewis Shiner
10) Freezone by John Shirley
11) Stone Lives by Paul Di Filippo
12) Red Star, Winter Orbit by William Gibson & Bruce Sterling
13) Mozart in Mirrorshades by Bruce Sterling & Lewis Shiner
